titleStmt.title: A sermon to bring to remembrance God's wonderful mercies at the Boyn preach'd on the second day of July, 1699 at St. Nicholas within, Dublin: by John Stearne, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Stearne, John, 1660-1745.
